summary: Accomplished risk and finance professional with CFA designation that draws on a rare and valuable mix of conducting financial risk analysis, understanding regulatory policies, and designing processes to mitigate potential risks. Meticulous and highly motivated professional with an advanced understanding and 6+ years of experience in successfully performing risk and finance duties, and working with multiple stakeholders. A collaborative team player with a strong track record in building strong professional relationships and promoting a culture of best practices, support, and continuous improvement. An excellent communicator both verbally and written, with a proven ability to perform work in an ethical and professional manner.
